class_description:
An era in the ISO calendar system. The ISO-8601 standard does not define eras.
 A definition has therefore been created with two eras - 'Current era' (CE) for
 years on or after 0001-01-01 (ISO), and 'Before current era' (BCE) for years before that. Do not use ordinal() to obtain the numeric representation of IsoEra.
 Use getValue() instead.
